products.title: Lexington Blockout Taupe Solar/thermal Pleated Free-hanging Blind
products.description: Their lexington collection of thermal perfect fit pleated blinds is both luxurious and practical. Featuring their thermal fabric technology - these blinds keep your home warm in the winter whilst still maintaining the sophisticated look of pleated blinds. If you're looking for energy efficient blinds their lexington collection is ideal because of the celluar technology - honey-comb shaped pockets which trap air inside and limit the heat transfer from your windows.

products.title: Electric Oculus Modern Grey Roller Blind
products.description: A blind doesnt get much more contemporary than this, a crisp grey roller with some seriously clever features. The voile fabric is a chic modern alternative to tired old net curtains, offering perfect daytime privacy without sacrificing any of the light you want, and while stil a blind doesnt get much more contemporary than this, a crisp grey roller with some seriously clever features.

products.title: Splash Noir
products.description: Min width: 600mm max width: 5000mm min drop: 450mm max drop: 3500mm composition: polyester guarantee: 12 months stack: a choice of left, right or split.
